Package: ai.vital.sql.query

[Java] Class SQLSelectQueryHandler

    • ai.vital.sql.query.SQLSelectQueryHandler

    • This implementetaion maps vital SELECT query into exactly one SQL query statement. Query over multiple segments is covered by sql UNION

      Authors:
      Derek
